title: Riddle solver
shortDescription: Helped solve a QR-code riddle of a geocache.
description: This tool helped me solve a riddle of a geocache. The goal was to move parts of an image to form a QR-code. After the pen & scissors approach turned out to be messy, ive created this site and solved the riddle within 10 minutes.

title: Calculator
shortDescription: A old school calculator, as a part of the Odin course.
description: This calculator was a part of the Odin course. It was a good exercise to get used to the DOM and event listeners. The calculator is able to do basic calculations, but nothing more fancy.

title: Etch-a-Sketch
shortDescription: This was meant to be an Etch-a-Sketch, but i got a little distracted.
description: This was meant to be an Etch-a-Sketch, but i got a little distracted with effects. Drawing is as simple as hovering and the colored squares will fade the color away.

title: Odin Exercise
shortDescription: A repo with exercise corresponding to the Odin project.
description: This repo contains exercises corresponding to the Odin project. It is a good way to get used to the basics of HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Drum Kit
shortDescription: A drum kit, as a part of the Odin course.
description: This drum kit was a part of the Odin course. It was a good exercise to get used to the DOM and event listeners. The drum kit is able to play sounds, when the corresponding key is pressed.

title: Small Projects
description: This repo contains small projects, which are not worth a single repo.

title: Snake
description: This is a simple snake game. Was made with P5.js.

title: Pong
description: This is a simple pong game. Was made with P5.js. Its a two player game. Its a bit buggy when the ball gets too fast.

title: Flappy Bird
shortDescription: A simple flappy bird game. Ugly as hell.
description: This is a simple flappy bird game. Was made with P5.js. Its ugly as hell, but it works. So i got distracted with other projects.

title: Game of Life
description: This is a simple game of life. Was made with P5.js. This one is actually kind of cool.

title: Gift-Wrapping Algorithm
description: This is a gift-wrapping algorithm. Was made with P5.js. This one is actually kind of cool.

title: Discord Bot
shortDescription: A discord bot. Didnt do much, but it was fun.
description: This is a discord bot. It didnt do much, just some basic commands. But it was fun to make.
